author: Staff Reporter
text:
Advertisement spaces at bus shops in Kancheepuram taken over by SVEEP messages

As part of a massive exercise by the District Election Office to get people to exercise their franchise, advertisement spaces in bus stops are being taken over by elector awareness slogans. Other initiatives include setting up of flex boards with catchy slogans at junctions, printed cards with voter awareness messages being tagged on domestic gas cylinders, stickers being pasted on purified drinking water cans, and deployment of a video van to screen awareness clippings.

SVEEP (systematic voters’ education and electoral participation) messages will be spread through cultural and sports events.

SVEEP monitoring officials have been posted in each Assembly constituency in the district.
title: A clean SVEEP
